info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 3:29AM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Northwest wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart and Eastern St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM today to 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel conditions will deteriorate beginning this morning. Strong wind gusts with falling snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute, but will likely impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
